import React from "react"; import wire3 from "../assets/images/section5wire.svg"; import round from "../assets/images/round.svg"; import girl22 from "../assets/images/girlsection5-image.png" const Banner = () => { return (
TECH TRAINING,
CONSULTING,
PRODUCTS.

We are part of the solution in building a SKILLED continent.

); }; export default Banner;
